phrs.translation: 开普敦（等于Capetown，南非西南部港市）
卡纳维拉尔角（位于美国）
n. 佛得角群岛（大西洋岛国）

sentences.sentence: I like that part of Cape Town.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢开普敦的那个地方。

sentences.sentence: He swished his cape around his shoulders.
Their first port of call will be Cape Town.
sentences.translation: 他们第一个停靠港是开普敦。
